title: African server
body: Yo riot first of all love the game and second of all thanks for the hard work you guys have done but third of all would really love an african server because 200 ping is abit much sometimes and you would probaly lose money but thats fine because you love us african people but seriously please look into giving us africans better ping would be much appreciated. Thank you from a person who is fed up from hearing other africans telling me to play dota:(.

replies.body: YO Imma let you finish, but, we love you too fam! We're always looking for ways to expand and make sure all of our player base can play reasonably well, but sometimes things like finding a suitable geographical location can make it a little harder than you'd expect. Make sure you post this kind of feedback over in Client Discussion!
